images.copyright: Dalmatian pelicans, Lake Kerkini, Greece (© Guy Edwardes/naturepl.com)
images.title: Feather forecast: pelicans ahead
images.caption: Dalmatian pelicans, Lake Kerkini, Greece
images.desc: Winter at Lake Kerkini in Greece delivers some of Europe's clearest views of Dalmatian pelicans. Their large silhouettes move in tight, steady groups across the still water, making their scale hard to miss. With wingspans stretching over 10 feet, they rank among the world's largest flying birds. Lake Kerkini's predictable winter conditions offer reliable, close-range views of their size, grace, and coordinated movement.
